Articles.Content:
Umm, true?

The next user thinks that ROFLCopter should be punished for forgetting to say something about the next user.

True!

The next user will be able to guess something about the user below Him/Her

Wow, you must be Dr. Who!

The user below me is trying to write a "Career Mode" ruleset for KSP.

False. Already did with my API.

And, I did make a question previously. It was a fact for you to say if it was true or false.

Charlie Chaplin came third in a Charlie Chaplin look-alike contest.

(True or false?)

false, even when I did have windows 7.

The next person has made it to or beyond orbit of Eeloo (landing)

If Charlie Chaplin looks like Charlie Chaplin, then why isn't he the first? So the answer is false. Ninja'd. Below orbit of Eeloo, yes, landing, NO!

True of false: The International Space Station orbit at about 7.4 km/s, or about 26640 km/h.

Edited May 2, 2013 by Designer225

Approximately true

Average speed 7,706.6 m/s

(27,743.8 km/h, 17,239.2 mph)

The next user thinks we should get back to asking questions about the next user, rather than true/false trivia questions.

True.

The user below me doesn't come from the US

Ninjad

Edited May 2, 2013 by MacDuckenstein

False.

The next user comes from somewhere in Europe.

False. America.

The next user is staying up past their normal self-imposed bed time.

False, I have to pick up more medication tomorrow

The next user is male

False, I have to pick up more medication tomorrow

The next user is male

True. Banned for double-posting.

(Yes, I did that.)

The user below me does not approve of double posting.

True, but sometimes your internet derps and you don't know if your message got through

The user below watches Top Gear

True, the one where they replace the wheels on a car with train wheels and put that on train tracks was my favourite.

The user below me watches Adventure Time.

That reminds me, I need to check on new episodes. A new one (or at least a preview) should be out by now.

False. This is the first I've heard of it. Looks neat.

The person below me has at some point driven (steered?) a boat.

Yes. Twas fun.

Also, my recommendations for the episodes you should watch: Puhoy, Jake the Dad, All the Little People, but watch the first season first to actually know the series.

The user below me thinks stringed fruit would be a good idea.

Most definitely not. I expect it will run into similar problems as the Ice Planet from Firefly. Problematic nourishment indeed.

Person below me has at some point gotten caught up posting forum games for ages.

True.

The next user is sad to here the news about Damion Rayne.

True.

New Adventure Time Preview!

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Dz4OWs_AiXQ&feature=player_embedded

The user below me is looking forward to this episode.

False, I think Adventure Time is a poor man's Misadventures of FlapJack

User below me has seen The Misadventures of FlapJack

False. What is it?

The user below me is trapped in a loop caused by time travel.

False

The user below me will say false

True ::Head explodes::

The user below me will laugh at this clip from Misadventure of Flapjack

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JOPwcBxrn2g

False.

The next user thinks ribbons are a good idea.
